name: what-did-you-get-done-this-week
description: Checks what you got done at an interval.

scripts.deploy: npm run build && mkdir -p ~/what-did-you-get-done-this-week && cp scripts/add_entry.sh scripts/snooze.sh ~/what-did-you-get-done-this-week/ && chmod +x ~/what-did-you-get-done-this-week/add_entry.sh ~/what-did-you-get-done-this-week/snooze.sh && ln -sf $(pwd)/dist/what.js ~/.config/argos/what.1m.js

author: Maurice Banerjee Palmer
